name: Castle
description: A noble castle houses the ruling class and serves as both residence and defensive stronghold, creating a center of political power and social hierarchy. The noble presence offers opportunities for advancement and patronage, while the strict social order can be both protective and oppressive.
atmosphere: Grand halls display tapestries and heraldic banners while servants in livery attend to noble guests. Courtly music drifts from feast halls as fine fabrics rustle in corridors. The air carries wealth, authority, and political intrigue. Throne rooms and private chambers showcase royal power and luxury.
